refnamediv.refpurpose: A (redundant) wrapper for SQL code, can be omitted.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This control can appear only inside event handling controls and it always contain SQL code to be executed when the event occurs. There is no difference for VSPX compiler whether SQL code is enclosed in 'script' control or not. Some WYSIWYG tools can display the enclosed SQL code to the application developer according to custom attributes of this control but it does not affect the generated Virtuoso/PL code of the page.

formalpara.title: language = SqlName
formalpara.para: Denotes the type of language, currently only Virtuoso/PL expressions are supported.

formalpara.title: debug-srcfile
formalpara.para: URI of the source document where the tag comes from.

formalpara.title: debug-srcline
formalpara.para: Line number in the source document where the tag comes from.

formalpara.title: debug-log
formalpara.para: This defines what sort of data are saved to the debugging log.
